com.parworks.androidlibrary.ar
Interface ARSite

All Known Implementing Classes:
ARSiteImpl
public interface ARSite

An interface representing an ARSite The state of an ARSite. Begins at NEEDS_MORE_BASE_IMAGES, then changes to NEEDS_BASE_IMAGE_PROCESSING when the required number of base images have been uploaded. After the base images have been processed, the state of an ARSite changes to NEEDS_OVERLAYS and finally to READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Author:
Jules White

Method Detail

addBaseImage

void addBaseImage(java.lang.String filename,
                  java.io.InputStream image,
                  ARListener<BaseImageInfo> listener)
Asynchronously add a base image. Throws an ARException if the state is not NEEDS_MORE_BASE_IMAGES or NEEDS_BASE_IMAGE_PROCESSING

Parameters:
filename - the name of the base image
image - an image as an InputStream
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes containing a BaseImageInfo object with the id of the new base image.

processBaseImages

void processBaseImages(ARListener<ARSite.State> listener)
Asynchronously begin processing the base images. Throws an ARException if the state is not NEEDS_BASE_IMAGE_PROCESSING

Parameters:
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes providing the state of the site

getState

void getState(ARListener<ARSite.State> listener)
Asynchronously gets the current state of the ARSite

Parameters:
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes providing the state of the site

addOverlay

void addOverlay(Overlay overlay,
                ARListener<OverlayResponse> listener)
Asynchronously add an overlay. Throws an ARException if the state is not NEEDS_OVERLAYS or READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Parameters:
overlay - the overlay to add
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes providing an overlay response which contains the new overlay id

updateOverlay

void updateOverlay(java.lang.String id,
                   OverlayData data,
                   ARListener<OverlayResponse> listener)
Asynchronously update an overlay. Throws an ARException if the state is not READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Parameters:
id - the overlay id
data - the overlay data
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes providing an overlay response which contains the new overlay id

deleteOverlay

void deleteOverlay(java.lang.String id,
                   ARListener<OverlayResponse> listener)
Asynchronously remove an overlay from the site. Throws an ARException if the state is not READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Parameters:
id - the overlay id
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes providing an overlay response which contains the new overlay id

augmentImage

void augmentImage(java.io.InputStream in,
                  ARListener<ARData> listener)
Asynchronously augment an image. Throws an ARException if the state is not READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Parameters:
in - the image in the form of an InputStream
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes providing an ARData object which contains a focal length and list of image overlays

augmentImage

void augmentImage(java.io.InputStream in,
                  double lat,
                  double lon,
                  double compass,
                  ARListener<ARData> listener)
Asynchronously augment an image and provide location coordinates. Throws an ARException if the state is not READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Parameters:
in - the image in the form of an InputStream
lat - the latitude of the image
lon - the longitude of the image
compass - the heading of the image
listener - the callback to be used when the call completes providing an ARData object which contains a focal length and list of image overlays

delete

void delete(ARListener<java.lang.Boolean> listener)
Asynchronously delete the site.

Parameters:
listener - callback to be used when the call completes providing a boolean indicating success or failure

augmentImage

ARData augmentImage(java.io.InputStream in)
Synchronously augment an image. Throws an ARException if the state is not READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Parameters:
in - the image to augment in the form of an InputStream
Returns:
an ARData object containing the focal length and overlays for that augmented image

augmentImage

ARData augmentImage(java.io.InputStream in,
                    long lat,
                    long lon)
Synchronously augment an image and provide coordinates. Throws an ARException if the state is not READY_TO_AUGMENT_IMAGES

Parameters:
in - the image to augment in the form of an InputStream
lat - the latitude of the image
lon - the longitude of the image
Returns:
an ARData object specifying the focal length and overlays of the augmented image
